inclusion.criterion: Adult patients who present to the ED with flank or abdominal pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: for whom ED provider orders a CT scan for suspected nephrolithiasis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects will not receive informed consent, and will not be contacted by staff
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis. Candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
